item.title: 保时捷报告第一季度交付量下降 4
item.description: 总部位于斯图加特的跑车制造商保时捷周三表示，与2023年相比，2024年第一季度的全球汽车交付量减少了4%，原因是中国市场面临挑战，以及北美地区与海关相关的交付延迟。【原文：Stuttgart-based sportscar maker Porsche delivered 4% fewer vehicles globally in the first quarter of 2024 compared to 2023, it said on Wednesday, citing a challenging market in China and customs-related delivery delays in North America.】

item.title: 灰度公司首席执行官认为比特币 ETF 资金外流已达到平衡状态
item.description: 加密资产管理公司灰度投资公司（Grayscale Investments）首席执行官迈克尔-桑纳夏恩（Michael Sonnenshein）在最新一期《ETFs内幕》节目中告诉路透社，经过几个月的投资者抛售，灰度比特币信托基金的资金外流可能正在达到平衡。【原文：Outflows from the Grayscale Bitcoin Trust may be reaching an equilibrium after months of investor selling, Michael Sonnenshein, CEO of crypto asset manager Grayscale Investments, told Reuters on the latest episode of Inside ETFs.】

item.title: 大众汽车第一季度交付量增长
item.description: 德国汽车制造商大众汽车公司今年前三个月的汽车交付量略有上升，在中国、北美和南美均实现了增长。【原文：German carmaker Volkswagen saw a slight rise in vehicle deliveries during the first three months of the year, as it recorded a growth in China as well as North and South America】

item.title: 亚洲供应瓶颈导致梅赛德斯-奔驰第一季度销量下滑
item.description: 德国高档汽车制造商梅赛德斯-奔驰（Mercedes Benz）周三表示，受亚洲供应瓶颈和豪华车型系列转换的影响，该公司第一季度的销量下降了 6%。【原文：Mercedes Benz sales fell 6% in the first quarter, hit by supply bottlenecks in Asia and its luxury model range changeover, the German premium carmaker said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，香港将于四月批准首批现货比特币 ETF
item.description: 两位熟知内情的人士称，现货比特币交易所交易基金可能于本月在香港推出，首批审批结果可能于下周公布。【原文：Spot bitcoin exchange-traded funds could be launched in Hong Kong this month with the first approvals likely to be announced next week, two people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 行业组织称中国汽车厂产能增长不快
item.description: 中国汽车工业协会（CAAM）的一位高级官员周三表示，中国汽车工厂的产能增长不快，闲置产能反而被关闭。【原文：Chinese auto factories' capacity is not growing fast and idled capacity is being closed instead, a senior official at the China Association of Automobile Manufacturers (CAAM) said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社称，ByteDance 全年利润猛增 60
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周三援引知情人士的话报道称，TikTok 的所有者字节跳动公司（ByteDance）2023 年的利润增长了约 60%。【原文：TikTok-owner ByteDance's profit jumped roughly 60% in 2023, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 宝马集团第一季度销售额略有增长
item.description: 宝马集团周三表示，今年第一季度共交付汽车 594,671 辆，同比增长 1.1%。【原文：The BMW Group delivered 594,671 vehicles in the first quarter of the year, the carmaker said on Wednesday, a rise of 1.1% year-on-year.】

item.title: 日本 Seven & i 公司称正考虑出售超市业务
item.description: 日本零售商 Seven & i Holdings 周三表示，作为企业价值最大化计划的一部分，该公司正在考虑将其主要由超市组成的商超业务上市。【原文：Japanese retailer Seven & i Holdings said on Wednesday it was considering a listing of its superstore business, which is mainly comprised of supermarkets, as part of a plan to maximise corporate value.】

item.title: 英国乐购在建立 "强劲势头 "后预计利润增长
item.description: 英国最大的零售商乐购（Tesco）预测，由于强劲的需求和新客户的加入，2023/24 财年的利润将进一步增长 11%。【原文：Tesco , Britain's biggest retailer, forecast a further increase in profit in its new financial year as strong demand and new customers helped it to post an 11% jump in 2023/24.】

item.title: 巴里卡乐宝营业利润因转型计划而下降
item.description: 全球最大的巧克力生产商巴里-卡乐堡公司（Barry Callebaut）周三公布的半年营业利润低于预期，原因是其转型计划造成了一次性支出。【原文：Barry Callebaut , the world's biggest chocolate maker, reported lower than expected half-year operating profit on Wednesday, hit by one-off expenses caused by its transformation plan.】

item.title: 早间竞标焦急等待美国通胀
item.description: Vidya Ranganathan 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Vidya Ranganathan】

item.title: 向中国发出工厂产能警告后，耶伦面临关税抉择
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）在对广州和北京进行为期四天的访问期间，向中国经济领导人发出严厉警告，称他们对清洁能源产品工厂产能的过度投资是不可接受的。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen hammered home a stern warning to China's economic leaders that their overinvestment in factory capacity for clean energy goods is unacceptable throughout her four-day visit to Guangzhou and Beijing.】

item.title: 基金抛售期权有助于缓和美股波动
item.description: 出售期权以获取收益的热门基金可能会缓和近期美股的波动，延续其在过去几个月中对市场产生的镇定作用。【原文：Popular funds that sell options for income may be moderating the recent bout of volatility in U.S. stocks, extending the calming effect they have had on the market for the last several months.】

item.title: 独家报道欧盟的新技术法律正在发挥作用--小型浏览器赢得了市场份额
item.description: 根据六家公司向路透社提供的数据，在欧盟立法迫使 Alphabet 旗下谷歌、微软和苹果公司让用户更容易转用竞争对手的浏览器后的第一个月，欧盟独立浏览器公司的用户数量激增。【原文：Independent browser companies in the European Union are seeing a spike in users in the first month after EU legislation forced Alphabet's Google , Microsoft and Apple to make it easier for users to switch to rivals, according to data provided to Reuters by six companies.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，苹果公司在印度的 iPhone 产量达到 140 亿美元
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周三援引知情人士的话报道称，上一财年，苹果公司在印度组装了价值 140 亿美元的 iPhone 手机，高达 14%（约七分之一）的高端设备来自印度。【原文：Apple has assembled $14 billion worth of iPhones in India in last fiscal year, making as much as 14% or about 1 in 7 of its marquee devices from India, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 彪马在与阿迪达斯和耐克的奥运争夺战中更加注重速度
item.description: 德国运动服饰品牌彪马（Puma）正利用今年的奥运会以及与短跑冠军牙买加队的合作，重点关注速度，与阿迪达斯（Adidas）和耐克（Nike）争夺竞争日益激烈的跑步和生活方式市场。【原文：German sportswear brand Puma is using this year's Olympic Games and its partnership with sprint champions Jamaica to focus on speed as it jostles with Adidas and Nike to carve out space in an increasingly competitive running and lifestyle market.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴创始人马云走出阴影，长期担任内部职务
item.description: 阿里巴巴联合创始人马云罕见地给员工写了一份长篇备忘录，表达了对这家互联网巨头重组努力的支持，这表明他在过去几年远离聚光灯之后，可能愿意扮演更积极的角色。【原文：Alibaba co-founder Jack Ma has penned a rare lengthy memo to employees that expresses support for the internet giant's restructuring efforts, a sign that he may be willing to take a more active role after spending the last few years out of the spotlight.】

item.title: 惠誉下调中国评级展望至负面，确认 "A+"评级
item.description: 周二，评级机构惠誉将中国的评级展望调整为负面，理由是中国的公共财政前景面临越来越大的风险。【原文：Ratings agency Fitch revised its outlook on China to negative on Tuesday, citing increasing risks to the country's public finance outlook.】

item.title: 第二季度海外销售额使优衣库所有者的利润增长 11
item.description: 全球服装巨头优衣库的日本运营商预计将在周四公布更强劲的季度利润，因为其海外业务将弥补国内增长放缓的影响。【原文：The Japanese operator of global clothing heavyweight Uniqlo is expected to post a stronger quarterly profit on Thursday as its overseas units make up for slowing growth at home.】

item.title: 中国电动汽车出口热潮助推新型汽车运输船需求激增
item.description: 数据显示，中国汽车制造商和托运人正在订购创纪录数量的汽车运输船，以支持电动汽车出口的蓬勃发展。【原文：Chinese automakers and shippers are ordering a record number of car-carrying vessels to support a boom in EV exports, data showed, putting China on course to amass the world's fourth-largest fleet by 2028.】

item.title: 亚洲股市因对日圆持谨慎态度而低迷，美国通胀成为关注焦点
item.description: 投资者密切关注日本当局为阻止日元下跌而可能采取的干预措施，并等待周三晚些时候的美国通胀数据为未来的利率走势提供线索，因此亚洲股市表现低迷。【原文：Asian stocks were muted as investors kept watch for possible intervention by Japanese authorities to stop the yen's decline and awaited U.S. inflation data later on Wednesday for clues to future interest rate moves.】

item.title: 微软和网易将在中国重新推出《魔兽争霸》游戏，结束宿怨
item.description: 中国视频游戏巨头网易表示，它正在与微软合作，将包括《魔兽世界》在内的热门游戏带回中国。【原文：Chinese video games giant NetEase said it is working with Microsoft to bring popular games including "World of Warcraft" back to the country after a public fallout that ended a decade-long partnership in 2023.】

item.title: 美元横盘，关键CPI数据公布前日元受关注
item.description: 美元在周三盘整，因为投资者的注意力集中在当天晚些时候美国将公布的一份关键通胀报告上，而日元仍被压制在市场认为是日本当局采取干预措施的底线附近。【原文：The dollar consolidated on Wednesday as investor attention fixed on a key inflation report due out of the U.S. later in the day, while the yen remained pinned a whisker away from what markets believe to be the line in the sand for Japanese authorities to intervene.】

item.title: 日本央行上田排除加息应对日元疲软的可能性
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫（Kazuo Ueda）表示，央行在制定货币政策时不会直接对货币走势做出反应，从而撇开了市场对日元暴跌可能迫使央行加息的猜测。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda said the central bank would not directly respond to currency moves in setting monetary policy, brushing aside market speculation that the yen's sharp falls could force it to raise interest rates.】

item.title: 美国原油库存增加抵消了中东的不确定性，原油走势平稳
item.description: 周三早盘，油价在连续两日下跌后持稳，因为对加沙停火谈判不确定性导致供应紧张的担忧被美国原油库存增幅高于预期所抵消。【原文：Oil prices held steady in early trade on Wednesday after two straight days of losses, as worries about tighter supply due to uncertainty over Gaza ceasefire talks were offset by a bigger-than-expected build in U.S. crude inventories.】

item.title: 世界银行推出衡量问责制的新记分卡
item.description: 世界银行集团周二公布了一个衡量其发展工作成果的框架，其中包括 22 项指标，一位高级官员称这是该银行在推动提高透明度和问责制方面取得的一项重要进展。【原文：The World Bank Group unveiled a framework on Tuesday for measuring the results of its development work with 22 indicators in what a top official called an important advance in the bank's push to increase transparency and accountability.】

item.title: 早间新闻聚焦利率决议和中国贷款
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 阿根廷加利西亚银行押注汇丰银行交易后通胀和利率下降
item.description: 阿根廷加利西亚银行（Banco Galicia）以近 5 亿美元的价格收购了汇丰银行在当地的资产，并押注新任自由派总统哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）将降低飙升的通胀率并放宽利率，以促进南美国家的贷款。【原文：Argentina's Banco Galicia, buying HSBC's local assets in a near $500 million deal, is betting that new libertarian President Javier Milei will bring down soaring inflation and ease rates to boost lending in the South American nation.】

item.title: 黑客声称拥有 UnitedHealth 被盗数据--这是虚张声势吗？
item.description: 一个新成立的黑客团伙声称已经获得了从美国最大的医疗保险公司联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group）窃取的大量数据，但由于证据不足，尚不清楚他们说的是否属实。【原文：A freshly formed hacking gang claims to have won access to a massive stash of data stolen from UnitedHealth Group , the largest U.S. health insurer, but with little evidence to go on it is not clear whether they are telling the truth.】
